attributes.action: Ban public sale of fireworks to protect our pets from terror and stress
attributes.additional_details: This country is a nation of pet lovers (particulary canines) and it is not right to put them under such stress and distress which can have a long term effect on their health and welfare. The type of firework produced now are frightening to some humans and this latest bonfire night sounds more like a war zone than a celebration. Some soldiers who have served in war zones find them very stressful so please restrict their use to oublic display only. We ourselves have had a beloved dog die from the stress and shock of a huge overhead bang
attributes.background: Ban tbe public sale of fireworks and  have public displays only as pets are put under extreme and unnecessary stress whjch can and has caused shock death

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
